text: Luc Charles Henri Beyer de Ryke (9 September 1933 â€“ 18 January 2018) was a Belgian journalist, television presenter, politician, and author. He was born in Ghent, East Flanders. He succeeded Jean Rey as a member of the European Parliament in 1980 and served until 1989. He was also an alderman of Uccle. Beyer de Ryke died of a ruptured aorta in Paris, France, aged 84. == References == Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Belgian journalists Category:MEPs for Belgium Category:Writers from Ghent Category:Belgian television presenters
title: Luc Beyer de Ryke
